lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to use throughout the day.
  • Nice to meet you! - A polite phrase when meeting someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when parting ways.

items.en: What time do you usually wake up?
items.explanation_en: This sentence asks about someone's waking time.

items.en: Do you have any plans for tonight?
items.explanation_en: This sentence inquires about evening plans.

items.en: I hope you are doing well.
items.explanation_en: This expresses a wish for someone's well-being.

items.en: What did you eat for lunch?
items.explanation_en: This asks about someone's lunch in the past.
This asks if someone is available over the weekend.
This expresses enjoyment of a past conversation.

items.target: Vamos a encontrarnos para un café algún día.
items.explanation_en: This suggests meeting for coffee in the future.
This asks about someone's feelings today.

items.en: I look forward to seeing you.
items.explanation_en: This expresses anticipation of seeing someone.
This asks if someone has been busy recently.
